Test.name: Pallete is almost empty
Test.WhatTest: "Tests whether a Pallete replies with the right message if it is almost empty (1-4 Blocks)"

Test.name: Pallete is empty
Test.WhatTest: "Tests whether a Pallete replies with the right message if it is empty (0 Blocks)"

Test.name: Pallete is not empty anymore
Test.WhatTest: "Tests whether a Pallete replies with the right message if it is not empty anymore(5 Blocks)"
